alert.note: Alert for Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms moving across central Wisconsin... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms moving across central Wisconsin. These storms were likely producing gusty winds, torrential downpours and small hail. The thunderstorms were moving to the east-southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pittsville around 505 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Stevens Point, Wisconsin Rapids, Whiting, Babcock and Lake Wazeecha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
